official_title: To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Public Health Service Act, and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for accountability of health plans.
short_title: Patient Care Dispute Resolution Act of 2001
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Patient Care Dispute Resolution Act of 2001 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Public Health Service Act, and the Internal Revenue Code to require group health plans and health insurance issuers providing health insurance coverage to have approved utilization review programs, claims procedures, and appeal procedures concerning claims denials.

titles.title: Patient Care Dispute Resolution Act of 2001
To amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, the Public Health Service Act, and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for accountability of health plans.
